author: vcoincheck
title: Project Evaluation Website
description: A lot of investors have lost money because of investing in scam projects and lack of objective information to invest their money effectively
solution: Building a website to help investors self-assess the projects they are interested in through questions to know if the project is good or not
experience: Our team has joined the crypto market since 2017 and have made a lot of webinars about analyzing projects on Cardano and other blockchains.
